disableOpenSheet.name: Click Behavior
disableOpenSheet.hint: Sets the module's behavior. "Double Click" also disables the default Foundry behavior of opening a character's sheet.

player-access.name: Minimum Permission Level
player-access.hint: Allows users with at least this permission level to modify initiative of owned tokens.

revertButton.name: Revert Button
revertButton.hint: A button that allows you to revert back to the last initiative value of a combatant.

orderButtons.name: Order Buttons
orderButtons.hint: Up and Down buttons that allows you to send a combatant first or last spot in the initiative.
